item.text: In the eleventh year, in the third month, on the first day of the month, the Lord’s message came to me:

“Son of man, say to Pharaoh king of Egypt and his hordes:

“‘Who are you like in your greatness?

Consider Assyria, a cedar in Lebanon,

with beautiful branches, like a forest giving shade,

and extremely tall;

its top reached into the clouds.

The water made it grow;

underground springs made it grow tall.

Rivers flowed all around the place it was planted,

while smaller channels watered all the trees of the field.

Therefore it grew taller than all the trees of the field;

its boughs grew large and its branches grew long,

because of the plentiful water in its shoots.

All the birds of the sky nested in its boughs;

under its branches all the beasts of the field gave birth;

in its shade all the great nations lived.

It was beautiful in its loftiness, in the length of its branches;

for its roots went down deep to plentiful waters.

The cedars in the garden of God could not eclipse it,

nor could the fir trees match its boughs;

the plane trees were as nothing compared to its branches;

no tree in the garden of God could rival its beauty.

I made it beautiful with its many branches;

all the trees of Eden, in the garden of God, envied it.
“‘Therefore this is what the Sovereign Lord says: Because it was tall in stature, and its top reached into the clouds, and it was proud of its height,

I <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> it <st data-num="03027" class="">over to</st> the <st data-num="0410" class="">leader</st> of the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st>. He has <st data-num="06213" class="">judged</st> it <st data-num="06213" class="">thoroughly</st>,<n id="1" /> as its <st data-num="07562" class="">sinfulness</st> deserves. I have <st data-num="01644" class="">thrown</st> it <st data-num="01644" class="">out</st>.

<st data-num="02114" class="">Foreigners</st> from the most <st data-num="06184" class="">terrifying</st> <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st> have <st data-num="03772" class="">cut</st> it <st data-num="03772" class="">down</st> and <st data-num="05203" class="">left</st> it <st data-num="05203" class="">to lie</st> there <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st>. In <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01516" class="">valleys</st> its <st data-num="01808" class="">branches</st> have <st data-num="05307" class="">fallen</st>, and its <st data-num="06288" class="">boughs</st> <st data-num="07665" class="">lie broken</st> in the <st data-num="03605 0650">ravines</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>. <st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">peoples</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st><n id="1" /> have <st data-num="03381" class="">departed</st><n id="2" /> from its <st data-num="06738" class="">shade</st> and <st data-num="05203" class="">left</st> it.

<st data-num="05921" class="">On</st> its <st data-num="04658" class="">ruins</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05775" class="">birds</st> of the <st data-num="08064" class="">sky</st> will <st data-num="07931" class="">live</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="07704" class="">wild</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">animals</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="01961" class="">walk</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> its <st data-num="06288" class="">branches</st>.

For this reason no watered trees will grow so tall; their tops will not reach into the clouds, nor will the well-watered ones grow that high. For all of them have been appointed to die in the lower parts of the earth; they will be among mere mortals, with those who descend to the Pit.

“‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: On the day it went down to Sheol I caused observers to lament. I covered it with the deep and held back its rivers; its plentiful water was restrained. I clothed Lebanon in black for it, and all the trees of the field wilted because of it.

I made the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st> <st data-num="07493" class="">shake</st> at the <st data-num="06963" class="">sound</st> of its <st data-num="04658" class="">fall</st>, when I <st data-num="03381" class="">threw</st> it <st data-num="03381" class="">down</st> to <st data-num="07585" class="">Sheol</st>, <st data-num="0854" class="">along with</st> those who <st data-num="03381" class="">descend</st> to the <st data-num="0953" class="">Pit</st>.<n id="1" /> Then <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="06086" class="">trees</st> of <st data-num="05731" class="">Eden</st>, the <st data-num="04005" class="">choicest</st> and the <st data-num="02896" class="">best</st> of <st data-num="03844" class="">Lebanon</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> that were <st data-num="08354" class="">well</st>-<st data-num="04325" class="">watered</st>, were <st data-num="05162" class="">comforted</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="08482" class="">below</st>.

<st data-num="01992" class="">Those</st> who <st data-num="03427" class="">lived</st> in its <st data-num="06738" class="">shade</st>, its <st data-num="02220" class="">allies</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st>, <st data-num="01571" class="">also</st> <st data-num="03381" class="">went down</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> it to <st data-num="07585" class="">Sheol</st>, <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02491" class="">those killed</st> by the <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>.

Which of the trees of Eden was like you in majesty and loftiness? You will be brought down with the trees of Eden to the lower parts of the earth; you will lie among the uncircumcised, with those killed by the sword! This is what will happen to Pharaoh and all his hordes, declares the Sovereign Lord.’”
